value:
To be honest, I'm still not sure why
you summoned me here. I'm just a
run-of-the-mill merc... Well, mostly.

Fódlan had plenty of mercenary work
to go around, but it was nothing
compared to the constant war here.

I've given orders before, but I get the
feeling you're better at it than me. So,
feel free to send me to the front lines.

Hey, are you busy right now? I'm
practicing a new technique and
could really use some help.

I'm not great at sitting still. Unfamiliar
places just make me want to wander
around, but I always seem to get lost.

I've come to deliver a message
from $Nf.$k$pWow, it sure is lively around here.
I'm getting stronger!
Yeah, not bad.
Wait, that's it?!
Hey, a new power! All right...

I'm Shez. A mercenary. I'll win no
matter who I'm up against, but only
after we sort out contract terms.

Out of curiosity, do you know when
our contract will end? Not that I'm
unhappy with it, or anything...$k$pIt's just... I know I can't keep fighting
as a mercenary forever. And when
that time comes, what happens?$k$pWill we wrap up the contract and go
our separate ways like a couple of
strangers? Maybe that's for the best.$k$pAt least that would mean I could
listen to the little voice in my head
saying I need to get back to Fódlan.$k$pNo point worrying about that now,
though. Seems like there's still
plenty to do around here.$k$pSo until that day does come, I'll keep
offering my blade to your cause.
That's my job, after all.
This ends here!
Here it comes!
You're done!
Oh, no. Not me!
No... I failed...
Other than fighting, my mom taught me everything I know.
Woah, there! You were about to get a face-full of counterattack!
No matter where you go, always keep a weapon at the ready.
This? It's a Merc Whistle. We use it to find each other on the battlefield. Can't get by without it.
I look like I was raised in the mountains? I was...but how can you tell?
Can't take my eyes off the map...
If the enemy comes, call for me. I'm always ready to head into battle.
Oh, sure.
What now?
Heading out.
